snippet.title: Chicku: Gameplay (PC HD) (Steam Early Access Platformer Game)
snippet.description:
Chicku Gameplay walkthrough part 1
Chicku PC Gameplay
Chicku Let's Play

Chicku Gameplay (PC) Playthrough
Genre: Action, Platformer, Early Access, Indie
Game Platform: Windows (PC)
Developer: Gatling Goat Studios
Release Date: 8 Apr, 2016

Chicku video game on steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/443630/
Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/user/tr1ppa?sub_confirmation=1

"Chicku" is a nail bitingly hard platformer in which the player has to escape the Barrington farm. You’ll be forced to dodge saws, spikes and many other deadly traps in order to save your brethren and rise against the evil Dr. Barrington. Play alone or with friends in this epic adventure and save or slaughter.. millions of chickens along the way. When you’re done saving your species, challenge your friends’ flying skills or their ability to handle a weapon in the bloodthirsty cockfight arena. Also, why not wear a fancy hat while you do it?

Chicku Game Features:
- Explore six major environments with well over 200 maps.
- Local multiplayer, play together with friends. Just as easy as picking up your controller and pushing a button.
- Master the maps to gather coins to unlock cosmetics and game modifiers.
- Learn to fly as a chicken! A unique way of controlling the character which is easy to learn, but hard to master!
- Replay your favorite environments in our new brawl mode with crazy modifiers to alter the gameplay. 

PC Gameplay Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLslfvIJAupsxYRIbkQaylzyzXUOo8LP46
Steam Early Access Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLslfvIJAupszqky2AMoqXlmmWV4DAztzp
PC Game Giveaway Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLslfvIJAupsxrVAhG94EWi6WDO7WEue0a
Steam Group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/gamingallthetime
Facebook: https://facebook.com/tr1ppaYT
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tr1ppa_games

Likes & feedback shows support for more.
Cheers folks. enjoy the game video! :)

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
